salmanshh_simple_abilities.name: Simple Abilities
salmanshh_simple_abilities.description: A lightweight ability system for fast-paced action games. Handles ability granting, cooldowns, activation callbacks, and custom data storage. Perfect for Nuclear Throne-style arcade games with quick ability activations and passive mutations.

ActivateAbility.description: Trigger an ability activation callback. Only works if ability is ready (off cooldown and enabled).

abilityID.name: Ability ID
abilityID.desc: Unique identifier for the ability to activate

ClearAllAbilities.description: Remove all abilities from the object. Triggers removal event for each ability.

CreateAbility.description: Give the object an ability. Creates a new ability slot if it doesn't exist.

CreateAbilityWithCooldown.description: Give the object an ability and set its cooldown in one action. Useful for initial setup.

CreateAbilityWithCooldownAndStacks.list-name: Create ability with cooldown and stacks
CreateAbilityWithCooldownAndStacks.display-text: Create ability [b]{0}[/b] with [b]{1}[/b]s cooldown and [b]{2}[/b] max stacks
CreateAbilityWithCooldownAndStacks.description: Give the object an ability and set its cooldown and max stacks in one action. Perfect for charge-based abilities.

CreateTemporaryAbility.display-text: Create temporary ability [b]{0}[/b] that expires after [b]{1}[/b] seconds
CreateTemporaryAbility.description: Create an ability that automatically removes itself after a duration. If ability already exists, just schedules new removal time Perfect for temporary power-ups and time-limited buffs.

duration.name: Duration
duration.desc: Time in seconds before ability is removed

RemoveAbility.description: Remove an ability from the object. Deletes all associated data.

abilityID.name: Ability ID
abilityID.desc: Unique identifier for the ability to remove

RemoveAbilityAfter.description: Schedule automatic removal of an ability after a duration. Useful for temporary power-ups and time-limited abilities.

duration.name: Duration
duration.desc: Time in seconds before ability is removed

SetAbilityActive.description: Set whether an ability is currently active (for channeled/duration abilities).

active.name: Active
active.desc: Whether the ability should be active

SetAbilityEnabled.description: Enable or disable an ability. Disabled abilities cannot be activated even if off cooldown.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.desc: Whether the ability should be enabled

ResetCooldown.description: Instantly reset an ability's cooldown to 0, making it ready to use immediately.

SetAbilityCooldown.description: Set the cooldown time for an ability. The ability will not be usable until the cooldown expires.

SetAbilityData.description: Store custom data on an ability (for passive bonuses, damage values, etc). Data is stored as strings.

value.name: Value
value.desc: Data value (will be converted to string)

AddStacks.description: Add charges to an ability. Will not exceed max stacks.

ConsumeStack.description: Manually consume one charge of an ability without triggering activation. Starts stack regeneration.

SetMaxStacks.description: Set the maximum number of charges an ability can have. Current stacks will be clamped to new max.

SetStacks.description: Set the current number of charges for an ability. Clamped between 0 and max stacks.

CompareCooldownRemaining.description: Compare the remaining cooldown time of an ability.

CompareStacks.description: Compare the current number of charges for an ability.

HasAbility.description: Check if the object has been granted a specific ability.

abilityID.name: Ability ID
abilityID.desc: Unique identifier for the ability to check

HasStacks.description: Check if an ability has at least one charge available.

IsAbilityActive.description: Check if an ability is currently active (for channeled/duration abilities).

IsAbilityEnabled.description: Check if an ability is enabled (can be used when off cooldown).

IsAbilityReady.description: Check if an ability is off cooldown and enabled (ready to use).

OnAbilityActivated.description: Triggered when an ability is activated.

abilityID.name: Ability ID
abilityID.desc: Unique identifier for the ability (empty string for any ability)

OnAbilityCreated.description: Triggered when an ability is created for the object.

abilityID.name: Ability ID
abilityID.desc: Unique identifier for the ability (empty string for any ability)

OnAbilityReady.description: Triggered when an ability's cooldown expires and becomes ready to use.

abilityID.name: Ability ID
abilityID.desc: Unique identifier for the ability (empty string for any ability)

OnAbilityRemoved.description: Triggered when an ability is removed from the object. The ability may be removed due to expiration or manual removal.

abilityID.name: Ability ID
abilityID.desc: Unique identifier for the ability (empty string for any ability)

OnMaxStacksReached.description: Triggered when attempting to add charges beyond the maximum stack limit. Useful for UI feedback or sound effects.

abilityID.name: Ability ID
abilityID.desc: Unique identifier for the ability (empty string for any ability)

OnStackConsumed.description: Triggered when a charge is consumed from an ability. The ability may lose charges due to activation or manual consumption.

abilityID.name: Ability ID
abilityID.desc: Unique identifier for the ability (empty string for any ability)

OnStackGained.description: Triggered when a charge is regenerated or added to an ability. The ability may gain charges due to regeneration or manual addition.

abilityID.name: Ability ID
abilityID.desc: Unique identifier for the ability (empty string for any ability)

GetAbilityCount.description: Get the total number of abilities currently granted.

GetAbilityData.description: Get custom data stored on an ability. Returns empty string if not found.

GetCooldownProgress.description: Get the cooldown progress from 0 (ready) to 1 (just started). Useful for UI progress bars.

GetCooldownRemaining.description: Get the remaining cooldown time in seconds for an ability.

GetExpirationProgress.description: Get the expiration progress from 0 (just created) to 1 (about to expire). Useful for countdown UI bars.

GetExpirationTime.description: Get the time remaining in seconds before an ability is automatically removed. Returns 0 if no removal scheduled.

GetMaxStacks.description: Get the maximum number of charges for an ability.

GetStackCooldownRemaining.description: Get the time remaining in seconds until the next stack regenerates.

GetStackProgress.description: Get the stack regeneration progress from 0 (about to regenerate) to 1 (just used). Useful for UI.

GetStacks.description: Get the current number of charges available for an ability.

ListActiveAbilities.description: Get a comma-separated list of all ability IDs currently granted.
